original_title: The Incredibly Strange Tale of The Man Who Lost His Love But Bought It Back With A Packet of Duck Rice
overview: After losing his wife to illness, an old man, feeling lost and alone, decides to go for a walk, with no idea of where his destination might be. Along the way, he encounters a feisty taxi driver and her peculiar housemate, and an unlikely relationship develops between the three of them, reinvigorating the old man’s hunger for life, love and good duck rice.
title: The Incredibly Strange Tale of The Man Who Lost His Love But Bought It Back With A Packet of Duck Rice
